data.sampled: Yes. The correct way to spell it is "kunde". It means "could" in English, and can also mean "know how to" depending on context. Here's an example sentence where it means "can": Han kan inte cykla ("He cannot cycle.") In this case, the verb "kan" is conjugated for first person singular present tense, which doesn't change much from its infinitive form, so it looks very similar to your input "kunnde". Hope that helps! Let me know if you need any more assistance.
